Text: Thanks...been looking for this movie for a long time.
Jus got it. saw it before great film. this copy looks ok but ye'd want to keep the seeding going. ive seeded to 3.2 and i'll be knocking it off at 4.

I have had this film for ages on video and pass it round like a hooker passes round the clap.Most of the time i have to wait what seems an age to get it back so thanks for the oppotunity to have it on a disc.For those who have not seen this film be sure to pay close attention to the beginning when the lotto numbers are checked,a more funny opening you would find hard to find anywhere,lol.
Absolutely brilliant. One of the funniest films ever made. Actually, it was made on the Isle of Man. But the scenery is similar to parts of Ireland.
